definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: That day, he removed the male goats that were streaked and spotted.
sentences.chinese: 当天拉班就将有条纹有斑点的公山羊。

sentences.english: Optimistic animals will see the striped rods as like the ones they were rewarded with.
sentences.chinese: 乐观的动物将看到有条纹的柱子就像他们得到奖励。

sentences.english: The head was brownish with dark streaking and a dark eye and ear-covert patch.
sentences.chinese: 呈褐色有条纹的头部，黑色的眼睛和遮蔽耳朵的眼罩。

sentences.english: A striped garter snake came flowing and curving through the forest of grass.
sentences.chinese: 一条有条纹的嘎特小蛇正在草丛中蜿蜒的向罗拉游来。

sentences.english: Aggressive: You look horrible in stripes.
sentences.chinese: 挑衅式:你穿有条纹的衣服很难看。

sentences.english: A tiger has a striped coat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎身上有条纹，而豹有花斑。

sentences.english: There is a striped sofa along the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一张靠墙放着的有条纹的沙发。

sentences.english: Why do zebras and tigers have stripes?
sentences.chinese: 斑马和老虎身上为什么有条纹？

sentences.english: I need one with stripes, please.
I have stripes on my body.
